Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive tier IV membership in the New York state and local retirement system to employees hired on or after January 1, 2010
Summary: Grants tier IV benefits in the New York state and local retirement system to employees hired on or after January 1, 2010.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive tier IV membership in the New York state and local retirement system to members hired on or after January first, two thousand ten
